questionTitle: Which of the following service is an open registry of business services?
questionExplanation: UDDI stands for Universa1, Description, Discovery, and Integration.

questionTitle: _________ allows different operating systems to run in their own memory space.
questionExplanation: VMM manages I/O for the virtual machines.

questionTitle: Which of the following adds an RSS feed to digital photo frame devices?
questionExplanation: Windows Live Gallery is a collection of developer add-ons for Windows Live products.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement related to the common characteristics of SOA.
questionOption1: They separate data-handling from presentation (user interface)
questionOption2: They support the incorporation of business rules, logic, and actions
questionOption3: They support packaging and deployment of applications
questionExplanation: These services differ in which language they use, support for different rendering technologies, and in other features.

questionTitle: Which of the following factors are deemed to be important considerations for evaluating cloud solutions?
questionExplanation: In addition to assigning security-provisioned cloud storage to a client or service requester, a cloud storage service provider must be able to deliver a measured level of service.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the operational domain of CSA?
questionExplanation: CSA is an industry working group that studies security issues in cloud computing and offers recommendations to its members.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Cloud services are having a major impact on cellular phone technology, and vice versa
questionOption2: Very few smartphones come with native applications that consume Web services
questionOption3: Mobile application developers are staging their apps in the cloud, and a number of hosting services provide support for this
questionExplanation: Many smartphones come with native applications that consume Web services.

questionTitle: Which of the following content is allowed as per virtual appliance block diagram shown below?
questionExplanation: Content can be structured or unstructured in virtual appliance.

questionTitle: Microsoft’s Office Web Apps are written in _______ and eventually are to be supplemented with Silverlight features.
questionExplanation: Microsoft’s Office Web Apps are online slimmed-down versions of the Microsoft Office suite.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers a desktop application or browser add-in for aggregating Webmail and social network accounts?
questionExplanation: FriendFeed site monitors brand presence.

questionTitle: ______ offering provides the tools and development environment to deploy applications on another vendor’s application.
questionExplanation: PaaS tool is a fully integrated development environment.

questionTitle: Electronic Business using eXtensible Markup Language standard is maintained by ________ initiative.
questionExplanation: Electronic Business using eXtensible Markup Language is a joint standard of OASIS and UN/CEFACT.

questionTitle: Which of the following is cross-platform API based on generalizing the major cloud vendors APIs?
questionExplanation: Efforts are underway to create more standardized cloud APIs.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a version of Hyper-V that runs on Windows Server 2008?
questionExplanation: The Windows Azure Platform extends applications running on other platforms to the cloud using Microsoft infrastructure and a set of enterprise services.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Mobile phones are differentiated into feature phones and smartphones
questionOption2: Cloud computing offers the capability to run cell phone applications and Web services and to store data remotely
questionOption3: The eventual impact of the cloud on mobile devices will be to make them thicker(as client)
questionExplanation: Many applications that run on smartphones, and in many cases features found in feature phones, are dependent upon the Web services found in the cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following adds the ability to synchronize messages, contacts, and calendars on any mobile phone that has ActiveSync?
questionExplanation: Hotmail also can be viewed in Microsoft Office Outlook using the Outlook Connector or using Windows Live for Windows Mobile phones on that phone’s operating system.

questionTitle: Which of the following synchronizes information obtained from RSS and ATOM sources?
questionExplanation: Live Framework includes the Live Mesh tools from Visual Studio 2008 and Visual Web Developer Express Edition 2008.

questionTitle: Applications such as a Web server or database server that can run on a virtual machine image are referred to as ______________
questionExplanation: The name virtual appliance is a little misleading because it conjures up the image of a machine that serves a narrow purpose.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: The Windows Azure service itself is a hosted environment of virtual machines enabled by a fabric called Windows Azure ApplicationFab
questionOption2: Windows Azure service is a Compliance as a Service offering
questionOption3: Windows Live Services is a collection of applications and services that run on the Web
questionExplanation: Some of these applications called Windows Live Essentials are add-ons to Windows and downloadable as applications.

questionTitle: Application frameworks provide a means for creating ________ hosted applications using IDE.
questionExplanation: PaaS IDEs run the gamut from a tool that requires a dedicated programming staff to create and run to point-and-click graphical interfaces.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Google Bookmarks is a detailed 3D model of the human body
questionOption2: Google Base is an online service that lets you save your favorite sites and attach labels and comments
questionOption3: The Chromium projects include Chromium and Chromium OS
questionExplanation: Google Chrome Sync is a Google Tool that Syncs your Google Chrome bookmarks across multiple computers.

questionTitle: Which of the following third-party application uses AWS APIs to control the various components and instances you have running?
questionExplanation: An advantage of Android and Windows Mobile is that they have their own dedicated infrastructure on which developers can host their applications.

questionTitle: Google Talk is a service that uses the ______ protocol for the Google Chat IM client.
questionExplanation: Google Voice is Google’s telephony application, which is also a VoIP service.

questionTitle: Which of the following are a worldwide content caching and delivery system for Windows Azure blob content?
questionExplanation: CDN is an edge network service that lowers latency and maximizes bandwidth by delivering content to users who are nearby.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: In a managed cloud storage system, the user provisions storage on demand
questionOption2: Unmanaged Storage is meant to support virtual cloud computing
questionOption3: In managed storage, the storage service provider makes storage capacity available to users
questionExplanation: User pays for the storage using a pay-as-you-go model in managed cloud storage.

questionTitle: Which of the following software can be used to implement load balancing?
questionExplanation: Load balancing can be used to increase utilization and throughput, lower latency, reduce response time, and avoid system overload.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the most widely used technique for abstraction?
questionExplanation: With load balancing, system requests are directed to appropriate systems on demand.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: To determine whether your application will port successfully, you should perform a functionality mapping exercise
questionOption2: Cloud computing supports some application features better than others
questionOption3: Cloud bursting is an overflow solution that clones the application to the cloud and directs traffic to the cloud during times of high traffic
questionExplanation: Mapping process involves determining the critical application features and then matching them to the cloud provider’s offering to see if those features can be supported.

questionTitle: The Skype protocol is a proprietary (closed-source) protocol, parts of which use the Global Index ______ protocol.
questionExplanation: Skype uses the peer-to-peer model that was based on Kazaa.

questionTitle: Which of the following framework is used for creating mobile interfaces and subsystems by OMTP?
questionExplanation: XACML is an OASIS standard that describes both a policy language and an access control decision request/response language (both written in XML).
